§ 3908. Definitions For purposes of applying this chapter, the terms “employing office” and “covered employee” have the meanings given those terms in section 401 of title 3. (Added Pub. L. 104–331, § 3(c), Oct. 26, 1996, 110 Stat. 4071.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Oct. 1, 1997, see section 3(d) of Pub. L. 104–331, set out as a note under section 1296 of this title.
